description.value:
You've discovered how to add the magic of dragons to your tradition.

Add the draconic bloodline's granted spells to your spell list; you must still learn them or add them to your repertoire as normal. These spells are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Shield], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.True Strike], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Resist Energy], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Haste], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Spell Immunity], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Chromatic Wall], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Dragon Form], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Mask of Terror], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Prismatic Wall], and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Overwhelming Presence].
